heif

Class BoxHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • heif.BoxHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageHandler

    public class BoxHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ImageHandler
    Handles parsing of HEIF/HEIC file structures based on the ISO Base Media Format.

    This class provides access to primary HEIF box components, such as Exif, by navigating through iloc, iinf, pitm, and related boxes.

    For detailed specifications, see:

    • ISO/IEC 14496-12:2015
    • ISO/IEC 23008-12:2017

    Since:
    17 June 2025
    Author:
    Trevor Maggs

    • Method Detail

      • parseBoxes

        private void parseBoxes()
        Parses all HEIF boxes from the file stream and populates the internal box map.

      • getExifBlock

        public byte[] getExifBlock()
                    throws ImageReadErrorException
        Extracts the raw Exif data block from the HEIF container.

        The returned byte array starts at the TIFF header and excludes the Exif identifier prefix.

        Returns:
        a byte array containing the TIFF-compatible Exif block
        Throws:
        ImageReadErrorException - if the Exif block is missing, malformed, or cannot be located

      • getBox

        private <T extends Box> T getBox(HeifBoxType type,
                                 java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
        Retrieves a specific box by its HeifBoxType and expected class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic box type
        Parameters:
        type - the box type identifier
        clazz - the expected box class
        Returns:
        the matching box, or null if not present or of the wrong type

      • processMetadata

        public Metadata<? extends BaseMetadata> processMetadata()
                                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                                        ImageReadErrorException
        Extracts Exif metadata from the HEIF file.
        Specified by:
        processMetadata in interface ImageHandler
        Returns:
        a Metadata object containing the parsed Exif data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        ImageReadErrorException - if Exif data cannot be located or is invalid
